title: 10th Muharram a message to create a society of justice, equality: Faisal Javed
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 19 (APP): Chairman Senate Standing Committee on Information and Broadcasting Senator Faisal Javed Khan on Thursday said that 10th Muharram gives us a message that we need to create a society where injustice does not succeed and where equality and honour prevails.
In a tweet on Ashura Day, he said this day also protecting all from brutality of every kind and ensuring freedom for all, adding that it is also a call for helping the poor and needy.
The 10th of #Muharram gives us a message that we need to create a society where injustice does not succeed & where equality prevails, where honour prevails. Protecting all from brutality of every kind and ensuring freedom for all. It is also a call for helping the poor and needy
â€” Faisal Javed Khan (@FaisalJavedKhan) August 19, 2021
